aboutme.description: As an experienced artificial intelligence researcher with a demonstrated history of working in the computer software industry for more than 5 years, I have been trying my best to use latest technologies, in different fields of industry, like sports, ITS (Intelligent Transportation Systems) and etc. Strong engineering professional with a Bachelor's degree focused on Electrical and Electronics Engineering encouraged me to design the hardware as well as the firmware needed to implement prototypes of the mentioned system as well as a good knowledge to handle with intelligent embedded systems. Right now, I am concentrated on industrial usage of computer vision and looking forward to achieving such opportunities.
